heroSection.title: Limber Martínez - Web Developer
heroSection.subTitle: Growing in web development, ready for new challenges
heroSection.smallText: Discover my experience and how I'll bring value to your project

aboutSection.title: Passionate about web development
aboutSection.subTitle: My name is Limber Martínez, I live in Germany, and I have a deep interest in programming and web development. My passion for this field began when I started a business and discovered WordPress and Shopify. As I gained skills, the world of development fascinated me even more, and I decided to specialize in it. My current goal is to master the key concepts of Full Stack Developer to focus on frontend or backend and apply my experience to future projects.

learningSection.title: Expanding horizons
learningSection.subTitle: I finished high school and completed a middle technical degree in electromechanics before entering the world of programming. Currently, I am completing a university access course at UNED Madrid, Spain, equivalent to high school. My passion for programming motivates me to continue learning and growing in this field, exploring new challenges and opportunities to expand my skills and knowledge.

footerSection.footerTitle: Thank you for visiting my portfolio!
footerSection.footerText: Feel free to contact me for any questions or job opportunities

cardtext.title: Personal Interests and Values
cardtext.text: Originally from Bolivia, I have over 10 years of experience in logistics. I am fluent in Spanish, have a B1 level of fluency in German, and possess high school level English proficiency. In my free time, I enjoy video games, soccer, and cycling. Perseverance and constant learning are fundamental aspects of my life, driving me to keep growing in the world of web development and programming.

cardtext.title: UTN Full Stack Developer
cardtext.text: I am studying for a Full Stack Developer diploma at UTN in Buenos Aires, learning key skills such as HTML, CSS3, JS, React, Angular, Node, Express, and backend development.

cardtext.title: Oracle Developer
cardtext.text: The Oracle One Altura Program teaches me programming logic and frontend development with JS React, while I face practical challenges and interesting projects.

cardtext.title: IBM Full Stack Developer
cardtext.text: Thanks to the IBM Full Stack Developer on Coursera, I am expanding my skills in areas such as cloud computing, JS, React, GitHub, Node.js Express, Python, SQL, Django, Docker, and Kubernetes.

cardtext.title: ILS Fernschule
cardtext.text: With the Amazon Career Choice Program, I completed a course at ILS Fernschule, learning HTML, CSS, JS, and key regulations for web development in Germany.

cardtext.title: This Website
cardtext.text: Developed a frontend site using HTML, CSS, JS React, and Bootstrap. Faced challenges like reusing cards and icons, sending emails through EmailJS's SMTP API, and language-switching using library i18n

cardtext.title: E-commerce
cardtext.text: Ongoing ecommerce frontend project using HTML, CSS, JS React, Bootstrap. Displays products with reusable cards, imports using Mercado Libre's API, and authenticates users through Firebase

cardtext.title: E-commerce
cardtext.text: Ongoing Angular ecommerce project, using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. Includes Home, Articles via API, login, registration, shopping list, and orders. Backend in planning stages. Responsive design expected
